author: neeme
msg: * added back the possibility to redirect commons logging output to avalon logger, if libraries are available. uses reflection, no hard dependencies
* made it possible to run this class from command line, most of parameters are then passed in through system properties - now it is easier to run fortress with ant <java> task
* add javadocs to document the command line functionality

author: neeme
msg: uncommented and refactored the testcase a bit, no functional changes

author: neeme
msg: no need for proxies while testing
